attributes.action: widen Winwick Road, Warrington at the bend with Dam Lane (leading to Cinnamon Brow)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At this point, the speed limit changes from 70 mph to 30 mph right on a bend, which is joined by another road at a T -junction - it is hazardous - I had an accident there, and so did someone else 20 minutes later. When the M62 / M6 Winwick Rd interchange gets jammed, motorists, some of whom don't know the area, cut through this country lane. The petitioner is calling on the P.M. to do something about this poor visibility please, or change the speed limit, liaising with Cheshire Constabulary and the Highways Agency.
